data.text:
Kroonstad, South Africa

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: -27.644606, 27.250900.

Kroonstad is a key transportation center and a center of agricultural industry in western South Africa. The city has the population of about 100,000 people and is considered the third largest town in the province. Kroonstad offers amazing opportunities for those tourists who like extreme kinds of activities, including safari for lions, extreme desert tours, and many more.
